text:
Cropster (https://cropster.com) | Java Developer | Innsbruck, the capital of the Alps, Austria, Europe | Full Time | ONSITE

Cropster is the market leader in software for the speciality coffee industry. We work with farmers, exporter, importers and roasters in over 80 countries around the world on a daily basis to help them deliver a better cup of coffee. We love and share the philosophy that producing high quality foods benefits producers and consumers equally.

Join us and help us build the tools and infrastructure that power the speciality coffee industry. https://www.cropster.com/about/careers/show/back-end-develop...

Workâ€“life balance:

If you love the outdoors, your bike or snow gear, then Innsbruck is definitely a place that you will enjoy. And don't forget, winter is coming!

Learn more at https://www.cropster.com/about/ or get in touch via email at jobs@cropster.com.
